description:
PC-96P is an upgraded generation of PC-96 gradient thermal cycler. Built with advanced Peltier technology, it delivers precise temperature control and outstanding durability. This makes it an ideal choice for life science research in a wide range of laboratories.
Features:
• 6 high precise peltiers
• Good temperature uniformity reduce edge effect
• Peltier based technology, max heating up rate 6℃ /sec
• 1024x768 pixel, 8 -inch color touch screen Automatically power failure recovery 
• Gradient range 42℃
• Small footprint, compact design
• One-touch rapid incubation function to meet the needs of experiments such as denaturation, enzyme digestion/ligation, and ELISA. MaxMed UAE is the leading supplier of PCR & Molecular Analysis in Dubai and across the United Arab Emirates. We provide professional PCR & Molecular Analysis with same-day quotes, fast delivery, installation support, and comprehensive after-sales service. Contact us at +971 55 460 2500 for expert consultation and competitive pricing.
